name: Neon beaters
description:
Prepare yourself for the realm of music and monsters, where destroying the monster is your objective and rhythm is your ally.

How to play:

Your objective is to kill the monster whole dodging it's bullets.

Controllers:

left click - attack

right click - dash

Theme:

Easy  to play, heard to be good

Team members:

Piotr Gożkowski, Patryk Błądek, Julia Gluz, Jan Szpotowicz

Team Name: 

Pulsar Gate Studio
